
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/lyhabc/p/18816226/mysql-200gb-table-backup-using-transportable-tablespace-for-offline-release" title="发布于 2025-04-15 08:00">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">MySQL下200GB大表备份，利用传输表空间解决停服发版表备份问题</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<h1 style="text-align: center;">MySQL下200GB大表备份，利用传输表空间解决停服发版表备份问题</h1>
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 8px 0px 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.9); font-family: 'PingFang SC', system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Helvetica Neue', 'Hiragino Sans GB', 'Microsoft YaHei UI', 'Microsoft YaHei', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; orphans: 2; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-wrap: wrap; white-space-collapse: collapse; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; letter-spacing: 0.578px; visibility: visible;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 20px; font-weight: bold; letter-spacing: 0em; color: #000000; font-family: PingFangSC-regular, sans-serif; text-align: left; word-spacing: 0em; visibility: visible;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; visibility: visible;">问题背景</span></span></p>
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 5px 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: #333333; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-indent: 0em; visibility: visible;" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; visibility: visible;">在停服发版更新时，需对 200GB 大表（约 200 亿行数据）进行快速备份以预防操作失误。</span></p>
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 5px 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: #333333; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-indent: 0em; visibility: visible;" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; visibility: visible;">因为曾经出现过有开发写的发版语句里，</span><code style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px 2px; padding: 2px 4px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; color: #d73200; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0em; background-attachment: scroll; background-clip: border-box; background-image: none; background-origin: padding-box; background-position: 0% 0%; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-size: auto; width: auto; height: auto; border-style: none; border-width: 3px; border-color: #000000 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4) rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 4px; font-family: 'Operator Mono', Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; visibility: visible;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; visibility: visible;">UPDATE</span></code><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; visibility: visible;">语句的</span><code style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px 2px; padding: 2px 4px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; color: #d73200; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0em; background-attachment: scroll; background-clip: border-box; background-image: none; background-origin: padding-box; background-position: 0% 0%; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-size: auto; width: auto; height: auto; border-style: none; border-width: 3px; border-color: #000000 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4) rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 4px; font-family: 'Operator Mono', Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; visibility: visible;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; visibility: visible;">WHERE</span></code><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; visibility: visible;">条件写错了，原本只需要更新几行数据，最终导致更新了半张表的数据。</span></p>
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 5px 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: #333333; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-indent: 0em; visibility: visible;" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; visibility: visible;">MySQL版本是MySQL 8.0.X，为了预防这种情况，需要对某个重要的大表进行预先备份，以便可以及时回滚，及时恢复，及时回退，对于备份方法大概有下面几种:</span></p>
<table style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; border-collapse: collapse; display: table; width: 677px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; visibility: visible;">
<thead style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; visibility: visible;">
<tr style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; visibility: visible;"><th style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 5px 10px; outline: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; word-break: break-all; hyphens: auto; border-width: 2px 1px 1px; border-style: solid; border-color: rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); border-image: initial; background: none 0% 0% / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box #f0f0f0; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.2em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-align: center; height: auto; border-radius: 0px; min-width: 85px; visibility: visible;"><strong style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; background: none 0% 0% / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-style: none; border-width: 3px; border-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0px; visibility: visible;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; visibility: visible;">方案</span></strong></th><th style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 5px 10px; outline: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; word-break: break-all; hyphens: auto; border-width: 2px 1px 1px; border-style: solid; border-color: rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); border-image: initial; background: none 0% 0% / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box #f0f0f0; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.2em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-align: center; height: auto; border-radius: 0px; min-width: 85px; visibility: visible;"><strong style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; background: none 0% 0% / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-style: none; border-width: 3px; border-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0px; visibility: visible;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; visibility: visible;">优点</span></strong></th><th style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 5px 10px; outline: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; word-break: break-all; hyphens: auto; border-width: 2px 1px 1px; border-style: solid; border-color: rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); border-image: initial; background: none 0% 0% / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box #f0f0f0; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.2em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-align: center; height: auto; border-radius: 0px; min-width: 85px; visibility: visible;"><strong style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; background: none 0% 0% / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-style: none; border-width: 3px; border-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0px; visibility: visible;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; visibility: visible;">缺点</span></strong></th></tr>
</thead>
<tbody style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; visibility: visible;">
<tr style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; background: none 0% 0% / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box #ffffff; width: auto; height: auto; visibility: visible;">
<td style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 5px 10px; outline: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; word-break: break-all; hyphens: auto; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0px; visibility: visible;"><code style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; visibility: visible;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; visibility: visible;">mysqldump</span></code> <span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; visibility: visible;">&nbsp;导出</span></td>
<td style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 5px 10px; outline: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; word-break: break-all; hyphens: auto; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0px; visibility: visible;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; visibility: visible;">简单易用</span></td>
<td style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 5px 10px; outline: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; word-break: break-all; hyphens: auto; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0px; visibility: visible;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; visibility: visible;">大表导出耗时（200GB 可能需数小时）</span></td>
</tr>
<tr style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; background: none 0% 0% / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box #f8f8f8; width: auto; height: auto; visibility: visible;">
<td style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 5px 10px; outline: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; word-break: break-all; hyphens: auto; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0px; visibility: visible;"><code style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; visibility: visible;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; visibility: visible;">CREATE TABLE...SELECT</span></code></td>
<td style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 5px 10px; outline: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; word-break: break-all; hyphens: auto; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0px; visibility: visible;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; visibility: visible;">直接 SQL 操作</span></td>
<td style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 5px 10px; outline: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; word-break: break-all; hyphens: auto; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0px; visibility: visible;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; visibility: visible;">数据复制慢，锁表风险高</span></td>
</tr>
<tr style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; background: none 0% 0% / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box #ffffff; width: auto; height: auto; visibility: visible;">
<td style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 5px 10px; outline: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; word-break: break-all; hyphens: auto; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0px; visibility: visible;"><strong style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; background: none 0% 0% / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-style: none; border-width: 3px; border-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0px; visibility: visible;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; visibility: visible;">表空间</span></strong> <span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; visibility: visible;">传输</span></td>
<td style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 5px 10px; outline: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; word-break: break-all; hyphens: auto; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0px; visibility: visible;"><strong style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; background: none 0% 0% / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-style: none; border-width: 3px; border-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0px; visibility: visible;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; visibility: visible;">秒级备份</span></strong> <span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; visibility: visible;">，零数据复制</span></td>
<td style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 5px 10px; outline: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; word-break: break-all; hyphens: auto; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0px; visibility: visible;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; visibility: visible;">需操作系统权限，依赖文件拷贝</span></td>
</tr>
<tr style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; background: none 0% 0% / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box #f8f8f8; width: auto; height: auto;">
<td style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 5px 10px; outline: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; word-break: break-all; hyphens: auto; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0px;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">主从复制/延迟复制</span></td>
<td style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 5px 10px; outline: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; word-break: break-all; hyphens: auto; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0px;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">无需停服，恢复灵活</span></td>
<td style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 5px 10px; outline: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; word-break: break-all; hyphens: auto; border: 1px solid rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.4); max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; min-width: 85px; border-radius: 0px;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">需主从架构，维护成本高</span></td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 5px 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: #333333; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-indent: 0em;" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><strong style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; color: #000000; background-attachment: scroll; background-clip: border-box; background-image: none; background-origin: padding-box; background-position: 0% 0%; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-size: auto; width: auto; height: auto; border-style: none; border-width: 3px; border-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0px;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">这个场景的核心需求</span></strong><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">：停服更新的时间非常有限，比如1个小时之内要完成更新。</span></p>
<h3 style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 30px 0px 15px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; font-weight: 400; font-size: 16px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 20px; line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0em; font-weight: bold; display: block;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">操作流程</span></span></h3>
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 5px 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: #333333; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-indent: 0em;" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">前面两种都比较简单，通过导数据的方法来备份旧表，万一出现问题，可以使用导出来的数据进行快速恢复，第三种方法估计比较少人用，下面是具体操作方法</span></p>
<ol class="list-paddingleft-1" style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 25px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">
<li style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">源表与备胎表结构</span></li>
</ol>
<pre class="language-sql highlighter-hljs"><code>
-- 源表（aa）
CREATE TABLE aa (
id int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  sname VARCHAR(100)
) ENGINE=InnoDB;

-- 备胎表（bb）
CREATE TABLE bb (
id int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  sname VARCHAR(100)
) ENGINE=InnoDB;

greatsql&gt;&nbsp;INSERTINTO&nbsp;aa&nbsp;SELECT1,"nihao";</code></pre>
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 5px 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: #333333; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-indent: 0em;" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">2、查看两个表的表ID和表空间ID，可以看到aa表的表ID是1081 表空间ID是13，bb<span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">表的</span><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">表ID是1082<span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"> 表空间ID是14</span></span></span></p>
<pre class="language-sql highlighter-hljs"><code>greatsql&gt; select * from information_schema.innodb_tables where name='school/aa'\G
*************************** 1. row ***************************
          TABLE_ID: 1081
              NAME: school/aa
              FLAG: 33
            N_COLS: 6
             SPACE: 13
        ROW_FORMAT: Dynamic
     ZIP_PAGE_SIZE: 0
        SPACE_TYPE: Single
      INSTANT_COLS: 0
TOTAL_ROW_VERSIONS: 0
1 row in set (0.01 sec)

greatsql&gt; select * from information_schema.innodb_tables where name='school/bb'\G
*************************** 1. row ***************************
          TABLE_ID: 1082
              NAME: school/bb
              FLAG: 33
            N_COLS: 6
             SPACE: 14
        ROW_FORMAT: Dynamic
     ZIP_PAGE_SIZE: 0
        SPACE_TYPE: Single
      INSTANT_COLS: 0
TOTAL_ROW_VERSIONS: 0
1 row in set (0.00 sec)</code></pre>
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 5px 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: #333333; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-indent: 0em;" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">3、备胎表卸载表空间：</span></p>
<pre class="highlighter-hljs" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code>greatsql&gt;&nbsp;ALTER&nbsp;TABLE&nbsp;bb DISCARD&nbsp;TABLESPACE; &nbsp;-- 加锁并生成配置文件</code></pre>
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 5px 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: #333333; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-indent: 0em;" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">4、源表执行表空间导出：</span></p>
<pre class="highlighter-hljs" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code>greatsql&gt;&nbsp;USE&nbsp;school;
greatsql&gt;&nbsp;FLUSH&nbsp;TABLES&nbsp;aa&nbsp;FOR&nbsp;EXPORT; &nbsp;&nbsp;</code></pre>
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 5px 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: #333333; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-indent: 0em;" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">5、拷贝表空间文件（ibd和cfg文件），然后重新赋予权限，确保导入表空间时候不会出现问题</span></p>
<pre class="highlighter-hljs" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code>$&nbsp;cd&nbsp;/data/mysql/mysql3306/data/school
$ cp aa.ibd &nbsp;bb.ibd &nbsp;
$ cp aa.cfg &nbsp;bb.cfg
$ chown -R mysql:mysql /data/mysql/mysql3306/data/*</code></pre>
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 5px 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: #333333; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-indent: 0em;" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">6、在相同数据库下，备胎表导入表空间</span></p>
<pre class="language-plaintext highlighter-hljs"><code>greatsql&gt; USE school;
greatsql&gt; UNLOCK TABLES;  
greatsql&gt; ALTER TABLE bb IMPORT TABLESPACE;</code></pre>
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 5px 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: #333333; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-indent: 0em;" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">7、查询表数据，验证数据一致性</span></p>
<pre class="highlighter-hljs" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code>greatsql&gt;&nbsp;USE&nbsp;school;
greatsql&gt;&nbsp;SELECT&nbsp;*&nbsp;FROM&nbsp;bb;
greatsql&gt;&nbsp;SELECT&nbsp;*&nbsp;FROM&nbsp;aa;</code></pre>
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 5px 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: #333333; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-indent: 0em;" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">查询表数据正常，没有任何问题</span></p>
<pre class="highlighter-hljs" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code>greatsql&gt;&nbsp;SELECT&nbsp;*&nbsp;FROM&nbsp;aa;
+------+-------+
| id &nbsp; | sname |
+------+-------+
| &nbsp; &nbsp;1 | nihao |
+------+-------+
1 row in&nbsp;set&nbsp;(0.01&nbsp;sec)

greatsql&gt;&nbsp;SELECT&nbsp;*&nbsp;FROM&nbsp;bb;
+------+-------+
| id &nbsp; | sname |
+------+-------+
| &nbsp; &nbsp;1 | nihao |
+------+-------+
1 row in&nbsp;set&nbsp;(0.00&nbsp;sec)</code></pre>
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 5px 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: #333333; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-indent: 0em;" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">查看表的数据文件，没什么问题</span></p>
<pre class="highlighter-hljs" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code>$ ll
total 228
-rw-r----- 1 mysql mysql 114688 Mar &nbsp;4 16:51 aa.ibd
-rw-r----- 1 mysql mysql &nbsp; &nbsp;781 Mar &nbsp;4 16:52 bb.cfg
-rw-r----- 1 mysql mysql 114688 Mar &nbsp;4 16:52 bb.ibd</code></pre>
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 5px 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: #333333; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-indent: 0em;" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 5px 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: #333333; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-indent: 0em;" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">8、再次<span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">查看两个表的表ID和表空间ID，可以看到aa表的表ID是1081 表空间ID是13（没有变化），bb<span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">表的</span><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">表ID是1083<span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"> 表空间ID是14（表空间ID已经变了），bb表的表ID变了是防止与现有表冲突</span></span></span></span></span></p>
<pre class="language-sql highlighter-hljs"><code>

mysql&gt; select * from information_schema.innodb_tables where name='school/aa'\G
*************************** 1. row ***************************
          TABLE_ID: 1081
              NAME: school/aa
              FLAG: 33
            N_COLS: 6
             SPACE: 13
        ROW_FORMAT: Dynamic
     ZIP_PAGE_SIZE: 0
        SPACE_TYPE: Single
      INSTANT_COLS: 0
TOTAL_ROW_VERSIONS: 0
1 row in set (0.00 sec)


mysql&gt; select * from information_schema.innodb_tables where name='school/bb'\G
*************************** 1. row ***************************
          TABLE_ID: 1083
              NAME: school/bb
              FLAG: 33
            N_COLS: 6
             SPACE: 14
        ROW_FORMAT: Dynamic
     ZIP_PAGE_SIZE: 0
        SPACE_TYPE: Single
      INSTANT_COLS: 0
TOTAL_ROW_VERSIONS: 0
1 row in set (0.00 sec)</code></pre>
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 5px 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: #333333; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-indent: 0em;" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">9、发版更新与回滚</span></p>
<pre class="highlighter-hljs" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code>-- 发版操作（示例）
greatsql&gt;&nbsp;UPDATE&nbsp;aa&nbsp;SET&nbsp;sname =&nbsp;'new_value'&nbsp;WHERE&nbsp;id&nbsp;&gt;&nbsp;1;</code></pre>
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 5px 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: #333333; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-indent: 0em;" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">10、如果发版有问题，直接交换表名，最快速度恢复整个表的数据</span></p>
<pre class="highlighter-hljs" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code>-- 回滚操作（交换表名）
greatsql&gt;&nbsp;ALTER&nbsp;TABLE&nbsp;aa&nbsp;RENAME&nbsp;TO&nbsp;aa_temp;&nbsp;
greatsql&gt;&nbsp;ALTER&nbsp;TABLE&nbsp;bb&nbsp;RENAME&nbsp;TO&nbsp;aa;&nbsp;</code></pre>
<h3 style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 30px 0px 15px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; font-weight: 400; font-size: 16px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 20px; line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0em; font-weight: bold; display: block;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">总结</span></span></h3>
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 5px 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: #333333; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-indent: 0em;" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">整个操作最重要的是</span><strong style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; color: #000000; background-attachment: scroll; background-clip: border-box; background-image: none; background-origin: padding-box; background-position: 0% 0%; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-size: auto; width: auto; height: auto; border-style: none; border-width: 3px; border-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0px;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">第4步</span></strong><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">，操作系统级别的拷贝就完成了整个表的备份，相比于数据倒来倒去在速度上要快不少。另外，</span><strong style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; color: #000000; background-attachment: scroll; background-clip: border-box; background-image: none; background-origin: padding-box; background-position: 0% 0%; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-size: auto; width: auto; height: auto; border-style: none; border-width: 3px; border-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0px;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">第5步</span></strong><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">的备胎表也可以不用导入，只有当发现发版出现问题时候，再导入也可以。</span></p>
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 5px 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: #333333; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-indent: 0em;" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">这种方法的关键优势如下</span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1" style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 25px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">
<li style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">直接拷贝 .ibd 文件，无需逐行复制数据。</span></li>
<li style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">零锁表时间：</span><code style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px 2px; padding: 2px 4px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; background-attachment: scroll; background-clip: border-box; background-image: none; background-origin: padding-box; background-position: 0% 0%; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-size: auto; width: auto; border-style: none; border-width: 3px; border-color: #000000 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4) rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 4px; font-family: 'Operator Mono', Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">FLUSH TABLES tablename FOR EXPORT</span></code><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">&nbsp;仅短暂加锁（秒级）。</span></li>
<li style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">快速恢复：通过表名交换实现秒级回滚。</span></li>
</ul>
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 5px 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: #333333; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-indent: 0em;" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">特别适合于这几种场景：无主从架构的单实例环境、大表快速备份、停服时间敏感。</span></p>
<p style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 5px 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: #333333; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0em; text-indent: 0em;" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">当然，如果有主从架构的话，则更加推荐使用</span><strong style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important; color: #000000; background-attachment: scroll; background-clip: border-box; background-image: none; background-origin: padding-box; background-position: 0% 0%; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-size: auto; width: auto; height: auto; border-style: none; border-width: 3px; border-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-radius: 0px;"><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">第四种</span></strong><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;">方法，在操作上也更加可控，短时间也能保证能够完成。</span><span style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"><br style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; overflow-wrap: break-word !important;"></span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;<img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/257159/202409/257159-20240908204310924-1005667056.png" alt="" class="medium-zoom-image"></p>
<p><strong>本文版权归作者所有，未经作者同意不得转载。</strong></p>
</div>
<div class="clear"></div>

            </div>

<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/lyhabc">桦仔</a>&nbsp;

评论(<span id="post_comment_count">1</span>)&nbsp;

<a href="javascript:void(0)" onclick="AddToWz(18816226);return false;">收藏</a>&nbsp;
<a href="javascript:void(0)" onclick="reportManager.report({ currentUserId: '', targetType: 'blogPost', targetId: '18816226', targetLink: 'https://www.cnblogs.com/lyhabc/p/18816226/mysql-200gb-table-backup-using-transportable-tablespace-for-offline-release', title: 'MySQL下200GB大表备份，利用传输表空间解决停服发版表备份问题' })">举报</a>
</div>
